comment: There is "required" and "supplemental" material; if you don't read the "supplemental" material and quote it, however, you get points taken away. He does not give constructive feedback--he merely lists what you did wrong. Some assignments, such as writing assignments, merited no more feedback than a letter grade.
AWFUL. Boring professor who makes you attend class. Talks alot during class and makes you want to sleep. Reading quizzes weekly.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Professor Rick is very nice but if you don't do the work you won't pass and a lot of it is just busy work. There are a lot of assignments, group projects, and quizzes. A lot of times he is not very clear on his assignments but most of the time you can figure it out yourself. I would take him again if I had to.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Took Rick for Leadership Seminar, he is a very easy grader when it comes to the class. If you simply do the assignments you will get an A. The quizzes are from the book and the final at the end of the course is made up of questions from each quiz so be sure to take note of that. Both the final and the quizzes are online. Very easy if you try

If he gives you a group project or assignment, you're basically going in blind. He does not give out rubrics or clear guidelines for anything. Besides that it's easy to get an A. The final is word for word the questions from the 13 quizzes. Quizzes are abt 10 questions (wfw) from the reading. Nice guy.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--TEST HEAVY--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Does not offer constructive feedback on assignments. Is more concerned with finding typos than offering insight on the application of theory and connecting course material to real-world experience. Did not engage in class discussions. Did not write the curriculum and could rarely answer basic questions about assignments.
U are graded harshly on online discussions but the teacher never goes online. The only feedback is when he checks off the things you didn't do but he does not consider the quality of your work.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Rick was awful do not take his class

DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS!!! Rick is awful, rude ,and does not know what he is talking about most of the time.  He lectures for extended periods of time, and goes off on tangents about very boring topics.  He is not a good professor, and should not be teaching.  All of the assignments are very long and time consuming.  Find another professor!

Dr. Rick is a great guy. He is incredibly smart and tries out new things to Both try to better his teaching and benefit the students. There can by lots of reading and quizzes, but they are fairly easy. There are two major group assignments but he leaves most of the grade up to the group.

Rick is very rude. I had multiple occasions where I turned something in and he claimed i didn't. He doesn't seem to care about the students at all. His profession seems like a general annoyance to him. Lots of quizzes that are difficult. Don't take him.

Rick is a great guy! It is stupid how dumb people are to ruin this guy's reputation just because they did not like the work and probably did not get that Easy A they were looking for. Take Rick he is very nice and come on what other professor lets their class have a Pot Luck on the last day of the semester! Chill out people with that negativity!

buy far the worst. The class is supposed to be a GPA booster but was my only B 89.9 this semester. There is a ton of busy work and pointless discussions. Rick is rude and gets mad in class when students fall asleep and pay no attention to his stupid lectures. Screwed  grade intentionally, holds grudge cause I walked out class 10 min early. DONT

Theoretically, this class is an easy A, but somehow, even after doing almost all of my assignments I had a B in the class. He is interesting at times, but monotonous and you're likely to fall asleep. THE QUIZZES SUCK. You could read the text 50 times and you still might fail the quiz.

Most pointless class I've ever had to take. Quizzes are common sense, tons of reading. Horrible teacher, horrible assignments. Basically gave us busy work every day. Piles on quizzes and work when students have many other classes to worry about. DO NOT TAKE THIS PROFESSOR, you have been warned.

Lectures are endless. Daily, I have to find something to do to keep me occupied. There is about two quizzes a week over chapters that you have to read. When you aren't taking a quiz for homework, you're doing long, pointless busy work. Be careful- his instructions aren't clear and marks off for things that he doesn't even point out to do

Rick is with out a doubt not cut out to be a college instructor. His instructions are unclear or nonexistent, his assignments are pointless and long.  Not very knowledgeable, and is VERY condescending. He loves to make students feel bad about asking questions. He structured the class around the events in Ferguson, likes drama. DO NOT TAKE HIM!

I don't understand why some of these other reviews are so negative! Rick is so nice, I can't think of a time where he was ever rude or condescending. He is a very sweet man who puts a lot of time into his lectures and assignments. Yes, there are more assignments that I would prefer, but it's all very very simple. Take Rick!!

Rick makes this class way harder than it needs to be. There is so much busy work, its unbelievable. He puts the whole class to sleep when he lectures. Its very frustrating doing the work he assigns because it is so tedious and pointless. Its an easy A, but you have to do the work, which there is a lot of.

Rick is a terrible teacher. He is very rude and talks down to students. Much of the work in this class is pointless, I didn't learn anything new all semester. It's fairly easy to get an A though if you do all of the assignments. However, the quiz questions are unclear and confusing. Be prepared to do a lot of group work and online discussions.

Dr. Rick is condensending and rude. His work is easy but a waste of time. He never fails to lecture and lose interest of the entire class and get angry when no one responds to his questions. His work was almost always pointless and a waste of everyones time. He is monotone and takes his job too seriously. I would not recommend this teacher.
Since you have to take this class, take it through Dr. Rick.  He is a very smart man and one can learn a lot from him.  If you need help, he will provide it.

Professor Rick is very rude and condensing. His instructions on assignments are unclear. Class discussions were only over the book Justice which had nothing to do with the tests. There are also many online discussions.

Dr. Rick is a very knowledgeable man. Class itself can be a tad boring sometimes, but it is an easy A if you show up, do the online (easy) discussions and take the 2 group projects seriously. I strongly recommend him!

Rick is a little rude and does seem to act like he's better than everyone else, but he's a nice guy. He truly does care about people and sometimes his sense of humor throws that off. He gives a lot of online discussion assignments that are easy, but there are a lot of them. It's a useful class and it's easy as long as you do the work!
